subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Robin Lopez grabs an offensive rebound, scores on the put-back with an exaggerated, celebratory follow-through and is fouled. His free throw clanks off the front of the rim.
snippet: Robin Lopez grabs an offensive rebound, scores on the put-back with an exaggerated, celebratory follow-through and is fouled. His free throw clanks off the front of the rim.
